history.proof: intros Q p Hcomb. intros q Hcanon Heqp. induction Hcomb. - shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables a, p, q.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply H with (q := (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p)).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable q (no bound variables at all in the expression).

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p, q0, s : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q0 Q Hcomb : CombLinear Q p H1 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q0) p) q : list (Term A n) Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Heqp : eqP A eqA n s q IHHcomb : eqP A eqA n p q -> CombLinear Q q Unable to unify "reduce ?M2192 ?M2193 ?M2194 ?M2195 ?M2197 ?M2198 ?M2199 ?M2200 ?M2202 ?M2203 ?M2204 ?M2205 ?M2206 (pX ?M2207 ?M2210) (spminusf ?M2192 ?M2193 ?M2194 ?M2195 ?M2197 ?M2198 ?M2199 ?M2200 ?M2202 ?M2203 ?M2204 ?M2205 ?M2207 ?M2208 ?M2209 ?M2210 ?M2211)" with "CombLinear Q q".

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p, q0, s : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q0 Q Hcomb : CombLinear Q p H1 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q0) p) q : list (Term A n) Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Heqp : eqP A eqA n s q IHHcomb : eqP A eqA n p q -> CombLinear Q q Unable to unify "reduce ?M2192 ?M2193 ?M2194 ?M2195 ?M2197 ?M2198 ?M2199 ?M2200 ?M2202 ?M2203 ?M2204 ?M2205 ?M2210 ?M2211 (mults ?M2199 (divTerm ?M2200 (T1 ?M2194 ?M2203) ?M2208) ?M2212)" with "CombLinear Q q".

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p, q0, s : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q0 Q Hcomb : CombLinear Q p H1 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q0) p) q : list (Term A n) Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Heqp : eqP A eqA n s q IHHcomb : eqP A eqA n p q -> CombLinear Q q Unable to unify "inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q0 Q" with "CombLinear Q q".

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p, q0, s : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q0 Q Hcomb : CombLinear Q p H1 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q0) p) q : list (Term A n) Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Heqp : eqP A eqA n s q IHHcomb : eqP A eqA n p q -> CombLinear Q q Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q0) p)" with "CombLinear Q q".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : list (Term A n)), CombLinear Q p -> forall q : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> eqP A eqA n p q -> CombLinear Q q

Premises:
Inductive CombLinear (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) : list (Term A n) -> Prop := CombLinear_0 : CombLinear Q (pO A n) | CombLinear_1 : forall (a : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q -> CombLinear Q p -> eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p) -> CombLinear Q s Arguments CombLinear (_ _)%list_scope Arguments CombLinear_0 _%list_scope Arguments CombLinear_1 _%list_scope _ (_ _ _)%list_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
canonical : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
eqP : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
poly : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Type
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
irreducible_eqp_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q
reduceplus_mults_invf0 : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r s
reduce_inv2 : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists (x : list (Term A n)) (a : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a /\ inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM x Q /\ canonical A0 eqA ltM x /\ eqP A eqA n q (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (mults multA (n:=n) a x))
reduceplus_eqp_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r s
reduce_eqp_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r s
reducestar_eqp_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r s
canonical_reduceplus : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
canonical_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
order_reduceplus : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> ltP (A:=A) ltM q p \/ eqP A eqA n p q
red_minus_zero_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists r1 : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r1 /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q r1
reducestar_inv : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n p q /\ irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p \/ (exists r : list (Term A n), reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r /\ reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r q)
rep_plus_zero_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists r1 : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r1 /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) r1)
fconfl_top : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> Confluent A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q r
ltP_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> ltP (A:=A) ltM q p
reduce_mults : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) a q)

rep_minus_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists p1 q1 : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p p1 /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q q1 /\ eqP A eqA n s (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p1 q1)
rep_plus_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists p1 q1 : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p p1 /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q q1 /\ eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p1 q1)

red_plus_zero_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists r1 : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r1 /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) r1)

``` 
intros Q p Hcomb. 
intros q Hcanon Heqp. 
induction Hcomb.
- constructor.
- unfold spminusf.
  unfold spmultf.
  apply ConflTop with (p := (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p)) (q := s).
  + apply H with (q := (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p)).
    * apply plusP_reduce.
    * apply reducetop_sp.
    * apply reduce_mults_invf.
    * apply H0.
    * apply H2.
  + apply H1.
  + apply H3.
```

original: intros Q p Hcomb. intros q Hcanon Heqp. induction Hcomb. - constructor. - unfold spminusf. unfold spmultf. apply ConflTop with (p := (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p)) (q := s). + apply H with (q := (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p)). * apply plusP_reduce. * apply reducetop_sp. * apply reduce_mults_invf. * apply H0. * apply H2. + apply H1. + apply H3.
